name: Self Tan Golden Getaway Kit
about: What it is:An Ashley Graham-approved kit with your ultimate travel-size companions for a face and body glow..Skin Type:Normal.Skincare Concerns:Uneven Texture.Highlighted Ingredients:- DHA: Visibly colors the upper skin layer without sun exposure..Ingredient Callouts:These products are cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Get glowing with this top-selling tanning trio. Featuring Ashley Grahamu2019s golden essentials, this travel-friendly kit includes the award-winning Self Tan Express Mousse, Velvet Applicator Mitt, and full-size Purity Face Mist with a new, limited-edition scent formulated with Ashley Graham..This Set Contains:- 3.4 oz/ 100 mL St. Tropez Express Bronzing Mousse
ingredients: -DHA: Visibly colors the upper skin layer without sun exposure..B195.Purity Face Mist:Express Mousse:.Aqua (Water/ Eau), Dihydroxyacetone, Caramel, Propylene Glycol, Ethoxydiglycol, Glycerin, PPG-5-Ceteth-20, Decyl Glucoside, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum (Fragrance), Melanin, Cetyl Hydroxyethylcellulose, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Sodium Metabisulu00adte, Ethylhexylglycerin, Linalool, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Limonene, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Geraniol, Coumarin, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Hydroxycitronellal, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, CI 14700 (Red 4), CI 19140 (Yellow 5), CI 42090 (Blue 1).D202
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Step one: Prepu2014it's in the details. Create a flawless base by exfoliating and moisturizing dry areas: hands, feet, ankles, and wrists..-Step two: Applyu2014glide the Mousse on using the Luxe Applicator Mitt for a seamless finish and spritz the Face Mist under or over makeup..-Step three: Leave on for one, two, or three hours depending on your desired shade. For your face glow, there's no need to rinse of transferu2014simply leave on for six to eight hours..-Step four: Be beach readyu2014exfoliate and moisturize daily to extend the glow...Recycling Instructions:.-Carton fully recyclable..-Remove pump from bottle, bottle fully recyclable.

reviews.review_title: Golden Glow Without the Fuss: A Luxurious Experien
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The St. Tropez Golden Getaway Kit, which was kindly gifted to me, has been an absolute delight, particularly with the standout product of the collection, the No Transfer Mousse. This innovative tanning solution promises a hassle-free application and delivers precisely that, making the tanning process as effortless as a gentle breeze on a summer day.  From the moment the mousse, a generous gift from St. Tropez, touched my skin, I was impressed by its lightweight consistency and smoothness. The application was not only easy but also surprisingly quick, thanks to the mousse's formulation that absorbed rapidly without leaving any greasy residue. The experience was like my skin was being pampered with a luxurious treatment rather than a self-tan product. The no-transfer formula meant I could dress almost immediately without worrying about staining my clothes, which is a game-changer for anyone with a busy lifestyle.  The true magic, however, unfolded over the next 8 hours. As the tan developed, there was no uncomfortable stickiness or tightness on my skin, which can be a common issue with other tanning products. Instead, my skin felt hydrated and looked radiantly healthy, a testament to the quality ingredients used in St. Tropez's formula.  The final results were nothing short of spectacular. The tan looked incredibly natural, with a golden hue that seemed like I had just returned from a luxurious vacation. The evenness of the color was remarkable, with no streaks or patches, which often mar the outcome of self-tanning attempts. What impressed me most was the glow it imparted to my skin, making it look healthy and vibrant, not just tanned.

reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from ST.Tropez. I love the natural tan that this kit gives. It is easy to use and doesn't transfer onto clothes or sheets. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The St. Tropez Self-Tanning Mousse delivers a flawless bronzed glow with remarkable ease and convenience. As a self-proclaimed novice in the self-tanning realm, I was pleasantly surprised by its fuss-free application and impressive results. The mousse texture glided effortlessly onto my skin, evenly distributing the product without streaks or patches. What truly impressed me was its quick-drying formula, which eliminated any worries of product transfer onto clothing or sheets. The face spray was also super easy to use after exfoliating. After just one application, my skin was left with a natural-looking tan that lasted for days. Not only did the St. Tropez mousse impart a sun-kissed hue, but it also provided a hydrating boost, leaving my skin feeling moisturized and supple. The subtle fragrance added to the luxurious experience, without overpowering the senses. Overall, St. Tropez Self-Tanning Mousse exceeded my expectations, delivering a radiant and streak-free tan effortlessly. Its long-lasting results and moisturizing properties make it a standout product in the realm of self-tanning. Whether you're a seasoned tanning enthusiast or a beginner like myself, this mousse is sure to become a staple in your beauty routine. Gifted by St. Tropez.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the pleasure of trying out the St. Tropez Golden Getaway Kit, which was generously gifted to me by the brand. As someone who has used St. Tropez products in the past and always been impressed, I had high expectations for this kitu2014and let me tell you, it did not disappoint.  First and foremost, let's talk about the star of the show: the bronzing mousse. Not only is it incredibly easy to apply, but it also dries quickly and doesn't transfer onto clothing once it's dryu2014a huge plus in my book. The mousse feels smooth and luxurious on my skin, and the scent is far from unbearable, unlike some other tanning brands I've tried in the past.  As someone who takes their self-tanning routine seriously, I'm happy to report that the St. Tropez Golden Getaway Kit exceeded my expectations. After applying the mousse and allowing it to develop overnight, I was thrilled to wake up to a beautifully bronzed complexion. There was no hint of orangey-ness, no streaks, and no residueu2014just a natural-looking tan that made me feel like I'd spent a week in the tropics.  What sets this kit apart from others I've tried is the attention to detail and the high-quality results it delivers. From the ease of application to the flawless finish, every aspect of the experience was top-notch. It's clear that St. Tropez knows what they're doing when it comes to self-tanning, and this kit is no exception.  Overall, I couldn't be happier with the St. Tropez Golden Getaway Kit. Whether you're a self-tanning pro or a newbie looking to achieve a sun-kissed glow, this kit has everything you need to achieve flawless results. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable and effective self-tanning solution.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently treated myself to the St. Tropez Golden Getaway Kit, and let me tell you, it's a game-changer! The star of the show is definitely the no-transfer mousseu2014it's incredibly easy to use and fuss-free. Unlike other self-tanners I've tried, there's no need to worry about stains on clothing or sheets, which is a huge plus. The application experience was a dream. The mousse glides smoothly onto the skin, thanks to its lightweight texture, and it's quick-drying, so there's minimal waiting time. What impressed me the most was how it felt on my skinu2014it's so lightweight and comfortable, I barely even noticed it was there. As for the final result, I was blown away. The tan developed into a beautiful, golden glow that looked like I had just returned from a tropical vacation. It was natural-looking and streak-free, leaving me feeling confident and radiant. I can't recommend the St. Tropez Golden Getaway Kit enough for anyone looking for a hassle-free way to achieve a flawless tan offered by St. Tropez.
